name: Jungle Safari Adventure Animal & Crazy Little Girl & Boy Care - Dress Up Game For Kids
name_original: Jungle Safari Adventure Animal & Crazy Little Girl & Boy Care - Dress Up Game For Kids
description:
It's time to head out into the wild kingdom and play doctor! Jungle safari is an exciting medical game that lets you take care of four different sick animals.

The jungle safari game consists of 5 gameplay missions with more updates on the way. Sound effects and graphics make it even more realistic. Enter the jungle and start your Enjoying in this wild Lion simulator.We hope this is soon to be the best animal game.If you are looking for a jungle safari - andLittle Animal Care game to play, you have come to the right placeA Animal and girl needs more than a nice dress to make them happy. Since you're the doctor, you also get to feed your animals. .

jungle safari Game is a thrilling game set in the deep dark forest with many dangers.
this is one of the most popular and enduring series of all time.
jungle safari games bring your childhood back!
